io.zero88.jooqx

Interface ReactiveJooqxConn

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReactiveJooqxBase<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection>, ReactiveSQLBatchExecutor, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLExecutor<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection,io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,ReactiveSQLPreparedQuery,io.vertx.sqlclient.RowSet<io.vertx.sqlclient.Row>,ReactiveSQLResultCollector>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReactiveJooqxTx

    public interface ReactiveJooqxConn
extends ReactiveJooqxBase<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection>
    Represents for an executor that executes jOOQ query on Vertx reactive SQL client connection
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    SqlConnection
